titleStmt.title: By-laws proposed by the governour, deputy-governour, and committee of nine, pursuant to an order of the general court for the better manageing and regulating the companies affairs and approved of in a general court of the East-India Company, holden the 17th. of January, 1694/5.
titleStmt.author: East India Company.
Sommers, J.
Holt, John, Sir, 1642-1710.
Treby, George, Sir, 1644?-1700.

notesStmt.note: Signed: J. Sommers. C.S., J. Holt, Geo. Treby.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
"Given under our hands and seals, this eighth day of April, ... annoq; Domini, 1695."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
